petNameAdd:
1) STATE OF ASSAM
    Advocate - Tapan Kumar Bhattacharya

business_details.Business: Accused is present. Judgement delivered in the open court. The prosecution has failed to prove its case u/s 341/506 IPC against the accused beyond all resonable doubt. Hence, the accused is not guilty u/s 341/206 IPC and sec 4 of POCSO Act. The accused is acquitted and set at liberty. The bail bond stands cancelled and the bailor is discharged from all liabilities.The case is disposed of.
